newsitem.title: USA: Most IMM currency futures end moderately higher.
newsitem.headline: Most IMM currency futures end moderately higher.

text.p: May 8 - IMM currency futures ended moderately active trade mostly higher. Some brokers said late sales in Canadian dollar occurred after Moody's cut British Columbia's domestic rating to AA2 from AA1. They said other units stayed calm, with some calling day's gains part of retracement that could give sellers opportunity. Some noted good fund buying in Mex peso.
